speaker: Rumor Post
lines: Leafs of paper overlap like shingles: 'Missing pig (answers to Lordship)'.
'Caravan guard needed: east road; will pay less than deserved'.
A charcoal map of the alley shows an X that moves when you blink.
Someone has drawn horns on a drawing of someone who does not look upset about it.
The ink is fresh where someone added 'Don't.' to a poster that said 'Please.'
A tack holds down two notes that were not written by the same hand to the same person.
You smell oranges. There are no oranges.

choices.text: Take a guard notice and seek the back room.
